text: Epesses railway station () is a railway station in the locality of Epesses, within the municipality of Bourg-en-Lavaux, in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Simplon line of Swiss Federal Railways and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Epesses: * RER Vaud: ** : hourly service between and ; one daily round-trip continues from Villeneuve to . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Vaud Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations
title: Epesses railway station
